hanzi-su-wiki:
騰

Значения

Подниматься на дыбы, возвышаться, возрастать; скакать, седлать, перескакивать

Мнемоника

Породистая лошадь 馬 с норовом из тех, что берут для факельных шествий в честь императора 朕.

Варианты

腾
purpleculture_pinyin:
téng
to soar; to gallop; to prance; to turn over; to vacate; to clear
парить; скакать; скакать; переворачивать; освободить; очистить
rtega_mnemonic:
騰騰RS
腾腾		fly, gallop, run, prance, rise
  • majestic 朕 horse 馬 (pegasus) flying and running through the sky
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 腾)
Ideographic: A person 朕 riding a horse 馬
purpleculture_examples: 騰飛 [ téng fēi ]: lit. to fly upwards swiftly; fig. rapid advance; rapidly developing (situation)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 朕 [ zhèn ] the royal "we", for imperial use
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: Take flight on a horse and you can get there in a quarter of the time before the moon goes down and the sun comes up. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: inflation, edam, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, quarter, team of horses
koohiiStory1: Flesh+quarter=McDonald´s quarter pounder. Due to inflation, McDonald´s has had to start making quarter pounders out of horse meat.
koohiiStory2: Every quarter moon, the cost of a trojan horse rises one quarter by inflation.
jp_example_words: 沸騰(ふっとう): boiling, seething
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: While the moon is out, a gladiator is riding a horse, yelling about inflation. No one would listen to him during the day, so he waited for the moon to rise so he could complain about prices doing the same.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the gladiator riding his horse in the light of the moon yelling, "Do you have any idea how important it is to increase the average pay rate to account for inflation? All of us gladiators are going to be unable to pay the bills soon because inflation isn't being taken into account! You'll suffer too! Listen to me!"
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Inflation rises the most in とうきょう, and the gladiator knows that because that's where most of them live and fight (and die).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine if you were in this gladiator's place. In five years, you wouldn't be able to afford to eat thanks to the bosses in とうきょう refusing to adjust for inflation. Back in my day, onigiri only cost FIFteen yen!
Ru_Meaning: leaping up, jumping up, rising, advancing, going
Ru_Words:
沸騰ふっとう
  • кипение, бурление
  • возбуждение
    • 高騰こうとう
  • резкое повышение, резкий скачок (цен, стоимости)
    • warodai
    急騰きゅうとう
  • скачок, внезапное (резкое) повышение (цен)
    • warodai
    暴騰ぼうとう
  • резкое вздорожание (повышение цен)
    • warodai
    昇騰しょうとう
  • подъём, повышение (цен)
  • подъём (самолёта)
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 二 (два), 人 (человек), 并, 大 (большой), 月 (месяц), 馬 (лошадь)
Ru_trainchinese:
téng: (графема) скакать; подниматься, взмывать; поворачиваться; (после глагола) указывает на повторяющееся действие
téng: (глаг) освобождать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the body part (⺼) of the horse's (馬) relation (龹) is inflated
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Running is only a quarter as fast as if you put your body on a horse and really take flight.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " horse " to " zhen " sound. The original meaning is to pass. "Said Wen": "Teng, Chuan Ye. Cong Ma, Zhen Sheng." Such as "Huainanzi. "Miao Cheng": "Zi Chan Teng Ci, prison is complicated and innocent." Gao You's note: "Teng, Chuan Ye." Another example is "The Book of the Later Han." "The Biography of Wei Xiao": "Because of the number of books in Long and Shu, it is an announcement of misfortune and good fortune." The extension means spread and spread. For example, in the Tang Dynasty, Li Bai "Leave a Farewell to the Lords of Jinling": "The ground fan Zou Lu learns, and the poem is so beautiful that the name is thankful."

" Teng " means jumping. "Jade articles. Horse Department: "Teng, jump up." Such as "Zhuangzi. "Xiaoyaoyou": "I leaped up, but a few miles down, soaring between the basil, this also flew to the limit." "Historical Records. Biography of General Li: "Huteng, injured Guang, Guang also shot him."

" Teng " also means rising and flying. Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "Meng Chun": "It's the moon, the weather is declining, the atmosphere is rising, the heaven and the earth are in harmony, and the vegetation is flourishing." "Huainanzi. "Strategic Strategy": "Luan Ju Lin Zhen, Feng Fei Long Teng." also said to climb. For example, Li Bai's "Tianma Ge" in the Tang Dynasty: "Tengkunlun, Lixiji, without a single leg."

" Teng " means Mercedes-Benz. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. Nine songs. "Mrs. Xiang": "Wen Jiaren Xi called Yu, and will die soon." "Book of the Later Han Dynasty. "The Legend of Yuan Shao": "Zan is light and has few soldiers, and the horse rides forward. The righteous soldiers fought at the same time, and the Zan army was defeated."

" Teng " means riding and riding. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. Nine sighs. Stunned": "But Qiji used to transport the Xi, and the donkey and mule to drive away." Wang Yi's note: "Teng, take the opportunity." Another example is the Tang Dynasty Du Fu "Bitter rain sent to Longxi Gong and Wang Zhengshi": "Yanteng Teng A six-foot horse is like a lonely horse."

" Teng " also means to move and make empty. For example, Wang Jian in Tang Dynasty's "Poor Residence": "Sheng Sheng Teng Yao Qi, the word secretly changed bookmarks." "The Officialdom Xian Xing Ji" Chapter 6: "Both are too far away, it is better to vacate the academy."
humanum_short_description_en: From " horse " to " zhen " sound. The original meaning is to pass.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「朕」聲。本義是傳遞。《說文》：「騰，傳也。从馬，朕聲。」如《淮南子．繆稱》：「子產騰辭，獄繁而無邪。」高誘注：「騰，傳也。」又如《後漢書．隗囂傳》：「因數騰書隴、蜀，告示禍福。」引申表示傳播、流傳。如唐代李白〈留別金陵諸公〉：「地扇鄒魯學，詩騰顏謝名。」

　　「騰」表示跳躍。《玉篇．馬部》：「騰，上躍也。」如《莊子．逍遙遊》：「我騰躍而上，不過數仞而下，翱翔蓬蒿之間，此亦飛之至也。」《史記．李將軍列傳》：「虎騰，傷廣，廣亦竟射殺之。」

　　「騰」也表示上升、飛揚。如《呂氏春秋．孟春》：「是月也，天氣下降，地氣上騰，天地和同，草木繁動。」《淮南子．兵略》：「鸞舉麟振，鳳飛龍騰。」又表示登。如唐代李白〈天馬歌〉：「騰崑崙，歷西極，四足無一蹶。」

　　「騰」表示奔馳。如《楚辭．九歌．湘夫人》：「聞佳人兮召予，將騰駕兮偕逝。」《後漢書．袁紹傳》：「瓚輕其兵少，縱騎騰之，義兵伏楯下，一時同發，瓚軍大敗。」

　　「騰」表示乘、騎。如《楚辭．九嘆．愍命》：「卻騏驥以轉運兮，騰驢騾以馳逐。」王逸注：「騰，乘也。」又如唐代杜甫〈苦雨奉寄隴西公兼呈王徵士〉：「願騰六尺駒，背若孤征鴻。」

　　「騰」還表示挪移、使空。如唐代王建〈貧居〉：「蠹生騰藥篋，字暗換書籤。」《官場現形記》第6回：「這兩處都嫌遠，不如就把書院騰了出來。」

Ideographic: A person 朕 riding a horse 馬
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 朕 [ zhèn ] the royal "we", for imperial use
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
①奔跑，跳躍：騰驤。奔騰。歡騰。騰躍。騰越。
②上升：騰空。騰雲駕霧。升騰。飛騰。飛黃騰達。
③空出來，挪移：騰退。騰個地方。
④詞尾，用在動詞後面表示動作的反覆連續(讀輕聲)：翻騰。折騰。
騰飛 [ téng fēi ]: lit. to fly upwards swiftly; fig. rapid advance; rapidly developing (situation)

沸騰(ふっとう): boiling, seething

從「 馬 」，「 朕 」聲。本義是傳遞。《說文》：「騰，傳也。从馬，朕聲。」如《淮南子．繆稱》：「子產騰辭，獄繁而無邪。」高誘注：「騰，傳也。」又如《後漢書．隗囂傳》：「因數騰書隴、蜀，告示禍福。」引申表示傳播、流傳。如唐代李白〈留別金陵諸公〉：「地扇鄒魯學，詩騰顏謝名。」 「 騰 」表示跳躍。《玉篇．馬部》：「騰，上躍也。」如《莊子．逍遙遊》：「我騰躍而上，不過數仞而下，翱翔蓬蒿之間，此亦飛之至也。」《史記．李將軍列傳》：「虎騰，傷廣，廣亦竟射殺之。」 「 騰 」也表示上升、飛揚。如《呂氏春秋．孟春》：「是月也，天氣下降，地氣上騰，天地和同，草木繁動。」《淮南子．兵略》：「鸞舉麟振，鳳飛龍騰。」又表示登。如唐代李白〈天馬歌〉：「騰崑崙，歷西極，四足無一蹶。」 「 騰 」表示奔馳。如《楚辭．九歌．湘夫人》：「聞佳人兮召予，將騰駕兮偕逝。」《後漢書．袁紹傳》：「瓚輕其兵少，縱騎騰之，義兵伏楯下，一時同發，瓚軍大敗。」 「 騰 」表示乘、騎。如《楚辭．九嘆．愍命》：「卻騏驥以轉運兮，騰驢騾以馳逐。」王逸注：「騰，乘也。」又如唐代杜甫〈苦雨奉寄隴西公兼呈王徵士〉：「願騰六尺駒，背若孤征鴻。」 「 騰 」還表示挪移、使空。如唐代王建〈貧居〉：「蠹生騰藥篋，字暗換書籤。」《官場現形記》第6回：「這兩處都嫌遠，不如就把書院騰了出來。」

騰字的基本解释

騰
téng
见“腾”。

騰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［téng］
［《廣韻》徒登切，平登，定。］
“腾1”的繁体字。亦作“駦1”。亦作“驣1”。
(1)马奔跃，奔驰。
(2)跳跃。
(3)跨越；超越。
(4)胜过；凌驾。
(5)犹举。扬起；抬起。
(6)上升；登上。
(7)指物价上涨。
(8)水涌貌。
(9)乘，骑。
(10)传递；致。
(11)传扬；传播。
(12)闪射；呈现。
(13)蒸烤。
(14)挪动；挪移。
(15)使空出来。
(16)猛地；突然。
(17)通“媵”。送。参见“騰羞”。
(18)姓。汉《景君碑》碑阴题名有“門下督盜賊騰頌”。

騰字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騰； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1442第35
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒登切，音滕。【玉篇】上躍也，奔也。【禮·月令】季春，合累牛騰馬，游牝于牧。【註】累、騰，皆乗匹之名。【疏】季春陽盛，物皆產乳，故合累牛騰馬，使牝就牡，欲孳生蕃也。　又【說文】傳也。一曰犗馬也。　又姓。　又與媵通。【儀禮·公食大夫禮】衆人騰羞者盡階，不升堂，授以蓋降出。【註】騰當作媵。媵，送也。授，授先者一人。　俗作驣。

考證：〔使牡就牝，欲孳生蕃也。〕　謹照月令疏原文使牡就牝改使牝就牡。
騰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
騰字的起名意思

暂无。

Teng
Basic explanation of words
Teng
téng
See "Teng".
Teng
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［téng］
["Guangyun" Tu Dengqi, Ping Deng, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "腾1". Also known as "Fang 1". Also known as "驣1".
(1) The horse gallops and runs.
(2) Jump.
(3) Leap over; transcend.
(4) Overcoming; overriding.
(5) Still holding. Lift up; lift up.
(6) Ascend; ascend.
(7) Refers to rising prices.
(8) Water gushing appearance.
(9) Ride, ride.
(10) Pass; To.
(11) Propagate; spread.
(12) Flash; present.
(13) Steaming and roasting.
(14) Move; move.
(15) Make it vacant.
(16) Suddenly; suddenly.
(17) Through "Maid". give away. See "Teng Shame".
(18) Last name. In the Han Dynasty "Jingjun Stele", the stele's yin inscription is "Teng Song, the thieves under the supervision".
Teng
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　teng; Kangxi strokes: 20; page number: page 1442 35
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Du Dengqie, Yin Teng. [Jade articles] Shangyue also, Ben also. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】In the spring of season, the cows and horses are bound together, and they are swimming in the pasture. Name meaning

téng
вм. 腾
Radicals: 月, 馬,  (moon, horse, gladiator)
Meaning Mnemonic
While the moon is out, a gladiator is riding a horse, yelling about inflation. No one would listen to him during the day, so he waited for the moon to rise so he could complain about prices doing the same.
Picture the gladiator riding his horse in the light of the moon yelling, "Do you have any idea how important it is to increase the average pay rate to account for inflation? All of us gladiators are going to be unable to pay the bills soon because inflation isn't being taken into account! You'll suffer too! Listen to me!"
Reading Mnemonic
Inflation rises the most in とうきょう, and the gladiator knows that because that's where most of them live and fight (and die).
Imagine if you were in this gladiator's place. In five years, you wouldn't be able to afford to eat thanks to the bosses in とうきょう refusing to adjust for inflation. Back in my day, onigiri only cost FIFteen yen!
